description: A comprehensive dashboard for monitoring and controlling autonomous coding agents

features.description: Dashboard displays real-time feature completion progress
acceptance_criteria: Progress bar shows current completion percentage
Visual indicator distinguishes passing vs pending

features.description: Dashboard shows harness session status (running/idle/error)
acceptance_criteria: Status indicator shows current harness state
Timestamp of last update is displayed
Session type (initializer/coding) is shown when running

features.description: Feature list displays all features with their status
acceptance_criteria: All features from feature_list.json are shown

features.description: Progress timeline shows session history
acceptance_criteria: Recent sessions from claude-progress.txt are displayed
Each session shows timestamp and actions taken
Sessions are in reverse chronological order

features.description: Start/Stop harness buttons work
acceptance_criteria: Start button launches harness in background
Buttons are disabled appropriately based on state

features.description: Mode toggle switches between single and continuous mode
acceptance_criteria: Toggle switch changes harness run mode
Mode is passed to harness on start

features.description: Dashboard has responsive layout
acceptance_criteria: All content is accessible on small screens

features.description: Dark/Light theme toggle works
acceptance_criteria: Clicking toggles between dark and light themes
Theme preference is saved to localStorage

features.description: WebSocket connection for real-time updates
acceptance_criteria: Updates are pushed when files change

features.description: API endpoint returns harness status
API endpoint to start/stop harness
Progress chart shows completion over time
acceptance_criteria: Line chart displays feature completion history

features.description: Category breakdown chart
acceptance_criteria: Pie or bar chart shows features by category

features.description: Live log viewer shows harness output
acceptance_criteria: Log panel displays real-time harness output

features.description: Git commit history display
acceptance_criteria: Links to diff view if possible

features.description: Browser notifications on key events
Audio alert option
Multi-project support
Add new project wizard
acceptance_criteria: Form to configure project path and settings

features.description: Settings panel for harness configuration
Custom prompt editor
acceptance_criteria: Can edit initializer and coding prompts
Changes are saved to prompt files

features.description: Loading states for all async operations
Error states with recovery options
Keyboard shortcuts for common actions
acceptance_criteria: Shortcuts shown in tooltip or help

features.description: Help documentation modal
PRD Scanner - Automatically discover and index PRDs from target projects
acceptance_criteria: Scans target project directories for PRD files (*.md in docs/)
Indexes PRD content with metadata (title, date, features)
Displays PRD list per project in dashboard
Highlights new/updated PRDs since last scan

features.description: PRD Sync - Merge multiple PRDs into unified feature backlog
acceptance_criteria: Combines features from multiple PRD files
Tracks which PRD each feature originated from

features.description: PRD Voice/Text Input - Add new requirements via voice or text
acceptance_criteria: Text input field for new PRD requirements
Appends to existing PRD or creates new one

features.description: User Event Tracking Service - Backend event collection and storage
acceptance_criteria: API endpoint to receive tracking events
Stores events with user, session, and context data
Supports all event types (pageview, click, conversion, error)
Provides query API for retrieving events

features.description: Client-Side Tracking SDK - Drop-in tracking for target web apps
acceptance_criteria: Auto-tracks page views, clicks, scroll depth
Captures Core Web Vitals (LCP, FID, CLS)
Batched event sending with offline support

features.description: Funnel Analysis - Define and track conversion funnels
acceptance_criteria: Define multi-step funnels with event names
Track user progress through funnel steps
Calculate conversion and drop-off rates per step

features.description: Retention Analysis - Cohort-based retention tracking
acceptance_criteria: Group users into cohorts by signup date or event

features.description: Target Project Queue Dashboard - View and manage project queue
acceptance_criteria: Shows priority, enabled status, and completion progress

features.description: Target PRD Viewer - View and navigate PRDs inline
acceptance_criteria: Renders PRD markdown with syntax highlighting
Links to referenced files open in editor

features.description: Feature Extraction from PRD - Auto-generate feature list from PRD
acceptance_criteria: Parses PRD for user stories and requirements
Generates feature entries with IDs and categories
Creates acceptance criteria from PRD content

features.description: Sleep/Wake Mode - CPU-efficient idle state for harness
acceptance_criteria: Harness enters sleep mode when idle
CPU usage drops to <5% in sleep
Wake triggers: scheduled post, user access, checkback

features.description: Multi-Repo Queue Orchestrator - Process multiple repos in priority order
acceptance_criteria: Works on highest priority enabled project
Switches to next project when current completes

features.description: Adaptive Session Delay - Smart delay based on activity
E2E Test Runner Integration - Run and display E2E test results
acceptance_criteria: Display test results with pass/fail status

features.description: Test Coverage Dashboard - Visualize test coverage per feature
Cross-Project Analytics - Aggregate metrics across all targets
acceptance_criteria: Total features completed across all projects

features.description: Cost Forecasting - Predict future API costs
acceptance_criteria: Projects cost based on remaining features

features.description: Supabase Project Connection - Connect to target Supabase projects
acceptance_criteria: Store Supabase project credentials per target

features.description: Deployment Status Tracker - Track Netlify/Vercel deployments
PostHog/Analytics Integration - View analytics from target apps
